QuestData.Title: Burn It All Down
QuestData.Description:
Alright, the flamethrower is all patched up. Now we're going to get a little payback for Brennadam!
If it's flammable, it's a target. If not, well, it probably still needs to die anyway. And let's bring down those siege towers while we're at it.
Burn it all to the ground!
QuestData.LogDescription: Burn $1oa Lumber Piles and $2oa Siege Towers.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Felecia Gladstone near the Prototype Shredder.
QuestData.CompletionText: Well at least the flamethrower hasn't blown up on ya yet.
QuestData.RewardText: Nothing quite like the smell of freshly roasted Orc!
